## [Join The Society](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaQ6liiNrkIx3CXVfSu4BZvK5f2pUdE8tMltqRx9SN5ojiHQ/viewform)

::: col-sm-6
![](images/scripts.jpg){width="1024"} Annual membership of the society costs EUR30. Your annual membership helps to fund the annual meeting and to provide bursaries for students and researchers who could not otherwise participate in the society's activities. To apply for membership, please submit your details using the Google Form [here\*](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaQ6liiNrkIx3CXVfSu4BZvK5f2pUdE8tMltqRx9SN5ojiHQ/viewform).

Scholars wishing to apply for a waiver of the annual membership fee are cordially invited to do so.

\*Please note that any details you submit via this form are not securely encrypted, please do not post any sensitive information.
:::
